entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Temperature: -32.4°C

Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -36.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
